name: Toys Box - Blast & Pop Cubes
description:
Toy Box Blast - Crush Blocks & Pop Cubes is one of the best puzzle games online! Start blasting the same color boxes and cubes to create big combos & bonus points! Match three or more blocks of the same color to clear the level and collect the toys from where they stuck. But be careful! It is not that easy to save all the toys while your moves are limited! Your talent in solving puzzles will be your best tool while playing this super addictive game. No more crushing candies, breaking diamonds, crunching cookies or farming. Bust the blocks and enjoy this colorful adventure!

How to play
- Tap the same color toys boxes & you will be able to blast them!
- If you are blasting more than 5, you will get a special super power to use!

Download today Toy Box Blast - Crush Blocks & Pop Cubes if you adore the top puzzle games for kids!
